summary: An internal FBI email from October 8, 2019, providing a briefing update on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. It details the seizure of digital devices from Epstein's properties and person, schedules for attorney proffers involving co-conspirators, and the identification of victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; digital devices were seized from his Manhattan residence and from his person at the time of his arrest.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Identified as a co-conspirator; her attorney had a proffer scheduled for October 8, 2019.

connections.description: Maxwell is identified as a co-conspirator in the investigation of Epstein.

events.title: Attorney proffer for co-conspirator
events.description: An attorney proffer session was conducted for a co-conspirator (not Ghislaine Maxwell).

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell attorney proffer
events.description: An attorney proffer session was scheduled for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Co-conspirator proffer scheduled
events.description: An attorney proffer session for a co-conspirator was scheduled.

events.title: Victim briefing in Miami
events.description: A victim briefing was scheduled to be held in Miami.

events.title: Attorney proffer for co-conspirator
events.description: An attorney proffer session for a co-conspirator was scheduled.

events.title: Victim briefing in NYC
events.description: A victim briefing was scheduled to be held in New York City.

keyFacts: Approximately 78 digital devices were seized in total: 47 from Epstein's Manhattan residence, 29 from Little St. James, and 2 from Epstein's person at arrest.
Approximately 80 victims have been identified, with potentially dozens more unidentified.
Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as a co-conspirator, and her attorney had a proffer scheduled for October 8, 2019.
A hotline had received 194 calls, of which 26 were related to possible victims and 10 to possible co-conspirators.
Analysis of devices from the Manhattan residence and Epstein's person was limited due to an ongoing taint team review.
